title: Stage Lv6-D1-S02
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: The evidence demonstrates the defendant's innocence. (professional variant 1)
the professional object, Your Honor. (professional variant 1s)
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: The evidence demonstrates the defendant's innocence. (professional variant 1)
the professional object, Your Honor. (professional variant 1s)
The witness's testimony is consistent with the facts. (professional variant 1)
the professional will commence cross-examination. (professional variant 1s)
False testimony constitutes perjury. (professional variant 1)
the professional appeal to the members of the jury. (professional variant 1s)
Legal grounds have been clearly established. (professional variant 1)
The subpoena was lawfully issued. (professional variant 1)
A conviction will be rendered. (professional variant 1)
The court's judgment was impartial. (professional variant 1)
